TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenHandler extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration
Public MustInherit Class SecurityTokenHandler Implements ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 安全标记处理程序的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class for security token handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是所有安全令牌处理程序均都派生自的基类。The class is the base class from which all security token handlers derive. 安全令牌处理程序负责：A security token handler is responsible for: - 验证安全令牌 () 的设计过程和打包到令牌中包含声明的类型对象。Validating security tokens () of the type it is designed to process and packaging the claims contained in the token into a object. - 序列化和反序列化安全令牌的目的是要处理的类型。Serializing and deserializing security tokens of the type it is designed to process. - 序列化和反序列化密钥标识符子句 ()，请参阅它旨在处理目标和源类型的令牌``元素。Serializing and deserializing key identifier clauses () that refer to tokens of the type it is designed to process to and from `` elements. - 创建从安全令牌的实现所传递对象类。Creating security tokens from a object passed by implementations of the class. - 从实现的安全令牌创建密钥标识符子句类。Creating key identifier clauses from a security token for implementations of the class. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 提供现成的以下安全令牌处理程序：Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) ships the following security token handlers out of the box: - - - - - - - - - - - 大多数这些类公开实现特定于类设计的令牌的处理功能的其他成员。Most of these classes expose additional members that implement functionality that is specific to the processing of the tokens for which the class is designed. 在许多情况下，它可能是一种更好的做法派生自这些类而不是直接从一个类。In many cases it may be better to derive from one of these classes rather than directly from the class. 可以添加或从令牌处理程序集合中移除由指定的安全令牌处理程序[<添加>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)， [<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md)，或[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/clear.md)下的元素[ <securityTokenHandlers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md)配置文件中的元素。A security token handler can be added or removed from a token handler collection by specifying the [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md), [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md), or [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/clear.md) elements under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md) element in a configuration file. 对象，其中包含的处理程序集合的配置设置可以通过访问属性，该令牌处理程序的成员的处理程序集合可以从访问属性。The object that contains the configuration settings for the handler collection can be accessed through the property and the handler collection that the token handler is a member of can be accessed from the property. 您可以重写方法来处理您的处理程序采用任何自定义配置元素。You can override the method to process any custom configuration elements that your handler takes. 类公开一些其他属性和方法。The class exposes several other properties and methods. 根据您选择实现的功能，你可以重写部分或全部这些成员。Depending on the functionality that you choose to implement, you may override some or all of these members. 必须重写属性和方法可以向 WIF 基础结构提供有关您的类的安全令牌的类型的信息旨在处理。You must override the property and the method to provide the WIF infrastructure with information about the type of security token that your class is designed to process. 验证、 序列化和反序列化的指示处理程序是否可以执行特定函数的方法或实现的功能的方法与组合属性或方法通过公开功能。Validation, serialization, and deserialization functionality is exposed through properties or methods that indicate whether the handler can perform a specific function combined with the method or methods that implement the functionality. 以下列表对属性或实现该功能的方法与指示功能的方法：The following list pairs the properties or methods that indicate functionality with the methods that implement that functionality: - 属性和方法： 确认一个象征和打包到令牌中包含的声明。The property and the method: Validates a token and packages the claims contained in the token into a . - 属性和方法： 令牌序列化。The property and the methods: Token serialization. - 方法和方法： 令牌反序列化。The methods and the methods: Token deserialization. - 方法和方法： 反序列化密钥标识符子句。The method and the method: Deserializing key identifier clauses. - 方法和方法： 序列化密钥标识符子句。The method and the method: Serializing key identifier clauses. 并方法调用的实现中的管道从类。The and the methods are called from the pipeline in implementations of the class. 方法由 WIF 基础结构，以确定是否已接收到指定的标记。The method is called by the WIF infrastructure to determine whether the specified token has already been received. 默认情况下此方法返回`false`，指示令牌不已收到的。By default this method returns `false`, which indicates that the token has not already been received. 可以重写方法，并提供逻辑来检查重播的标记。You can override the method and provide logic to detect replayed tokens. ## Examples 中的所有的代码示例主题取自`Custom Token`示例。The code examples in all of the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和其他适用于 WIF 和从中下载这些示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的 XML 演示如何将 SWT 令牌处理程序添加到令牌处理程序集合。The following XML shows how to add the SWT token handler to the token handlers collection. ```xml ```

abstract member CanReadKeyIdentifierClause : System.Xml.XmlReader -> bool override this.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause : System.Xml.XmlReader -> bool

param.name: reader
param.span: 在开始元素上指定的 XML 读取器。

span.span: An XML reader positioned at the start element.

param.span: 不能通过这种方法读取器前移。

span.span: The reader should not be advanced by this method.

summary.span: 返回指示由指定 XML 读取器引用的 XML 元素是否为由此实例反序列化的关键标识符子句的值。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the XML element referred to by the specified XML reader is a key identifier clause that can be deserialized by this instance.

returns.span: 如果 方法可读取元素，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the method can read the element; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现返回`false`以指示无法读取密钥标识符子句。The default implementation returns `false` to indicate that the key identifier clause cannot be read. 在派生的类检查读取器指为了确定实例是否可以反序列化密钥标识符子句的元素。A derived class checks the element that the reader is referring to in order to determine whether the instance can deserialize a key identifier clause. 这通常通过调用与相应元素和命名空间的字符串指定的方法。This is typically accomplished through a call to the method with the appropriate element and namespace strings specified. 如果重写，还必须重写方法以提供逻辑来反序列化密钥标识符子句。If you override , you must also override the method to provide the logic to deserialize the key identifier clause.

summary.span: 返回指示指定标记是否可以作为由此实例处理类型标记的反序列化的值。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified token can be deserialized as a token of the type processed by this instance.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在派生类中实现验证，重写此属性以返回`true`并重写方法来实现验证逻辑。To implement validation in a derived class, override this property to return `true` and override the method to implement the validation logic. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写属性以指示自定义处理程序可以验证令牌。The following code shows how to override the property to indicate that a custom handler can validate tokens. 代码摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和其他适用于 WIF 和从中下载这些示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在派生类中实现序列化，重写此属性以返回`true`并重写方法来实现序列化逻辑。To implement serialization in a derived class, override this property to return `true` and override the methods to implement the serialization logic. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写属性以指示自定义处理程序可以序列化令牌。The following code shows how to override the property to indicate that a custom handler can serialize tokens. 代码摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和其他适用于 WIF 和从中下载这些示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). summary.span: 获取或设置提供配置当前实例的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that provides configuration for the current instance.

value.span: 对当前实例的配置对象。

span.span: The configuration object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常由配置基础结构中设置[ <securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)启动应用程序期间配置文件中的元素。The property is typically set by the configuration infrastructure from the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element in the configuration file during application start up. 在派生类中，您将使用以访问配置设置的属性; 例如，若要在中使用颁发者名称注册表方法可以从访问配置对象的属性。In derived classes, you use the property to access configuration settings; for example, the issuer name registry to use in the method can be accessed from the property of the configuration object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause CreateSecurityTokenReference (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, bool attached);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause CreateSecurityTokenReference(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, bool attached) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CreateSecurityTokenReference (token As SecurityToken, attached As Boolean) As SecurityKeyIdentifierClause
public: virtual System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifierClause ^ CreateSecurityTokenReference(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ token, bool attached);

abstract member CreateSecurityTokenReference : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken * bool -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause override this.CreateSecurityTokenReference : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken * bool -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause

param.name: token
param.span: 创建引用的标记。

span.span: The token for which the reference is to be created.

param.name: attached
param.span: 如果应创建附加引用，则为 ；如果应创建独立的引用，则为 。

span.span: if an attached reference should be created; if an unattached reference should be created.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写，为该类处理的标记创建安全标记引用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates the security token reference for tokens processed by that class.

summary.span: 通常通过安全标记服务 (STS) 调用此方法。

span.span: This method is typically called by a security token service (STS).

returns.span: 一个密钥标识符字句，该字句引用指定的令牌。

span.span: A key identifier clause that references the specified token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下此方法将引发异常。By default this method throws a exception. 派生的类重写此方法返回的密钥标识符子句 () 可用于创建``指定标记的元素。Derived classes override this method to return a key identifier clause () that can be used to create a `` element for the specified token. 从的实现调用类。Called from implementations of the class. 通常情况下，不需要时要使用，而不会创建一个自定义安全令牌服务。Typically, a does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created. 当安全令牌服务返回安全令牌时，已颁发的安全令牌包含对附加的和未附加的安全令牌的引用。When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens. 附加引用所引用的是包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头中的安全令牌，而未附加引用则引用未包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头中的安全令牌。Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references reference security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message. 这些引用通常确认已颁发的安全令牌的真实性。These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写方法以从指定的令牌创建密钥标识符子句。The following code shows how to override the method to create a key identifier clause from the specified token. 代码摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和其他适用于 WIF 和从中下载这些示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). [!code-csharp[WifRcCustomToken#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifrccustomtoken/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenhandler.cs#5)]

abstract member CreateToken : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken override this.CreateToken : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a security token using the specified token descriptor.

summary.span: 通过安全标记服务 (STS) 调用此方法。

span.span: This method is called by a security token service (STS).

returns.span: 与标记说明符属性匹配的安全标记。

span.span: A security token that matches the properties of the token descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing. 派生的类应引发如果已使用该令牌。Derived classes should throw a if the token has already been used. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 提供了类的缓存可能派生自的重播并[ <tokenReplayCache> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/tokenreplaycache.md)配置元素，它可以用于配置重播缓存使用的应用程序; 中的令牌处理程序但是，确切实现的方法由派生类的设计器。Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) provides the class from which replay caches may be derived and the [<tokenReplayCache>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/tokenreplaycache.md) configuration element, which can be used to configure the replay cache used by token handlers in an application; however, the exact implementation of the method is up to the designer of the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下此方法将引发异常。By default this method throws a exception. 验证和从反序列化的安全令牌中提取声明的基础结构调用方法。The method is called by the infrastructure to validate and extract the claims from the deserialized security token. 这些声明的集合中返回方法返回的对象。These claims are returned in the collection of objects returned by the method. 在通常情况下，此集合将包含单个标识。In the typical case, this collection will contain a single identity. 在派生类中，验证通常包括验证针对 Uri 中指定的受众的令牌中指定的目标的受众属性中指定的标记处理程序配置对象属性。In derived classes, validation typically includes validating the intended audience specified in the token against the audience URIs specified in the property of the token handler configuration object specified on the property. 这些 Uri 通常会在配置文件中设置[ <audienceUris> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/audienceuris.md)元素。These URIs are typically set in the configuration file under the [<audienceUris>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/audienceuris.md) element. 如果无法验证受众，应引发异常。If the audience cannot be validated, an exception should be thrown. 时处理令牌，通常通过将颁发者令牌传递给之一验证颁发者上的方法配置为通过处理程序对象属性。When processing the token, the issuer is typically validated by passing the issuer token to one of the methods on the object that is configured for the handler through the property. 通常通过配置的颁布者名称注册表[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)配置文件中的元素。The issuer name registry is typically configured through the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element in the configuration file. 返回的颁发者名称。The returns the name of the issuer. 此名称应该用于设置令牌中包含的声明中的属性。This name should be used to set the property in claims contained in the token. 如果颁发者名称注册表不包含颁发者令牌的条目返回`null`。If the issuer name registry does not contain an entry for the issuer token, returns `null`. 在这种情况下通常引发在派生类中，但此行为取决于类的设计器。In this case a is typically thrown in derived classes, but this behavior is up to the designer of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码演示的重写处理简单 web 令牌 (SWT) 的安全令牌处理程序的方法。The following code shows an override of the method for a security token handler that processes simple web tokens (SWT). 代码摘自`CustomToken`示例。The code is taken from the `CustomToken` sample. 有关此示例和其他适用于 WIF 和从中下载这些示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). [!code-csharp[WifRcCustomToken#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifrccustomtoken/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenhandler.cs#9)] 下面的代码演示`CreateClaims`方法调用的重写从上一示例中的方法。The following code shows `CreateClaims` method that is invoked from the override of the method in the previous example. 此方法返回创建从令牌中声明的对象。This method returns a object that is created from the claims in the token. 代码摘自`CustomToken`示例。The code is taken from the `CustomToken` sample. 有关此示例和其他适用于 WIF 和从中下载这些示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). [!code-csharp[WifRcCustomToken#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifrccustomtoken/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenhandler.cs#12)] [!code-csharp[WifRcCustomToken#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifrccustomtoken/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenhandler.cs#11)] 下面的代码演示`ValidateAudience`方法调用的重写从简单 web 令牌处理程序中的方法。The following code shows `ValidateAudience` method that is invoked from the override of the method in the simple web token handler. 此方法验证对用户 Uri 的配置中指定的令牌中包含的受众。This method validates the audience contained in the token against the audience URIs that were specified in configuration. 代码摘自`CustomToken`示例。The code is taken from the `CustomToken` sample. 有关此示例和其他适用于 WIF 和从中下载这些示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下此方法将引发异常。By default this method throws a exception. 重写此方法以提供用于序列化密钥标识符子句到 XML 的逻辑。Override this method to provide the logic to serialize a key identifier clause to XML. 如果重写此方法，则还应重写方法。If you override this method, you should also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下此方法将引发异常。By default this method throws a exception. 重写此方法以提供用于序列化到 XML 的安全令牌的逻辑。Override this method to provide the logic to serialize a security token to XML. 如果重写此方法，则还应重写属性。If you override this method, you should also override the property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写方法以序列化自定义令牌。The following code shows how to override the method to serialize a custom token. 代码摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和其他适用于 WIF 和从中下载这些示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).
